plot: A small liberal arts college team of non-engineers races its solar car across the United States and Canada against some of the most prestigious engineering schools in the world.
title: Racing with the Sun
plot_es: A small liberal arts college team of non-engineers races its solar car across the United States and Canada against some of the most prestigious engineering schools in the world.
plot_en: A small liberal arts college team of non-engineers races its solar car across the United States and Canada against some of the most prestigious engineering schools in the world.
